modName: Gearhog's Character Overhaul and Expansion - CBBE UNP Better Males
summary: An immersive and refined texture overhaul for both genders. Includes teeth, eyes, makeup, dirt replacer, all complexions, and an expansion for the player (additional dirt replacers, complexions, and eyes). An NPC overhaul is in the works (of all named [human/elven] NPCs).
descriptionHtml:
[center] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/142h1s2.png[/img]
[url=https://www.instagram.com/gearhog/] [img]http://i68.tinypic.com/mw5ie9.gif[/img][/url] [u][url=https://www.facebook.com/Narcinsom][img]http://i66.tinypic.com/33kyljn.gif[/img]
[/url][/u][/center]
[center][color=#cfe2f3][size=3][b][Navigation][/b][/size][/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=5&&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D88002%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D6185653&pUp=1]Requests & Suggestions[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=5&&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D88002%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D6185663&pUp=1]Feedback & Improvements[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=5&&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D88002%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D6185703&pUp=1]Help Wanted[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/51167/?]Changelog[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=9&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodreadme%2F%3Fid%3D88002&pUp=1]Read Me[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/51170/?]Complete mod list[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/51169/?]My other mods[/url]
[size=2][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz4XJXFO-NB7NcGU0c0453Q]YouTube Channel[/url][/size]
[s]Flickr[/s][size=1] (coming soon!)

[url=https://www.patreon.com/gearhog][img]http://i68.tinypic.com/2lmbaqr.png[/img]
[/url]Become a Patron to receive updates before anyone else!
You can also get things that will never be released!
[/size][/center][center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=2][b]Quotes from Real Women of Skyrim (NTO's predecessor):[/b][/size]

[font=Georgia][size=1][i]Every update I like this mod more and more and more haha
Now the npcs look so alive! It's awesome! - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/43898772]KEVINATORR[/url] 

All in all, this is a wonderful and welcomed new addition, plastic look will remain more popular,
but for those like me who appreciate a more realistic approach, we are blessed. Thank you for sharing your work. - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8267681]PTC001[/url] 

FREAKING BEAUTIFUL MOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THE BEST! - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/22256974]urbon[/url] 

This is the most realistic and detailed skin texture I've used for either original skyrim or SE. - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6473115]maydragon75[/url] 

[/i][/size][/font][size=2]----------------------------------------------------------------------------

[/size][color=#d0e0e3][size=1][i][Thank you so much for all the kind words and support I have received in the creation of my textures... they mean the absolute world to me.
You are what keeps this project alive! It would not be where it is without the love and respect all my lovely supporters have given me][/i][/size][/color][/center]
[center][b][size=5]Merry Christmas![/size][/b][/center]
[size=3]I'm releasing this now, in an incomplete state, as a Christmas present for all the lovelies on the Nexus! It'll be completed soon, with the exception of the NPC overhaul, which will take quite some time to complete.
Currently, [b]it replaces[/b] [b]every texture related to the [human/elven] characters, both male and female[/b]. But I'm working on a massive expansion which will include over 200 racemenu overlays, and a ton of complexions, eyes, eyebrows, makeup, warpaints, etc etc etc. For now, there is a smaller (but still rather large, considering) expansion included. But that's just the tip of the iceburge! So track this file to get notifications whenever there's a new update.[/size]


I was going to update RWoS with these changes, but since so many people like that version, and I've now got the male version completed, I figured I'd make a new page with all the new changes and extra features, leaving RWoS as a simple female skin. You can still use RWoS, just download this mod first and let the RWoS textures overwrite.

All the extra features such as eyes, moles, teeth, complexions, etc can now be found on this page.
[color=#ffff00][size=3][b]The rough complexion has been replaced with something extremely similar to the look you get with RWoS, so be sure to check it out if you're a fan of RWoS!!![/b][/size][/color]

I am also working on an NPC overhaul with these extra additions distributed throughout Skyrim, making the population much more diverse and appealing to the eye. Options will be added to the fomod installers, such as choice of wrinkles, roughness, etc.
Track this page to stay informed.
[color=#00ff00]If you'd like to help in creating unique NPCs, check out [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=5&&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D88002%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D6185703&pUp=1]this page[/url], and leave a comment.[/color]
[size=1][color=#00ffff]I need to edit 100+ female NPCs alone, and that's not including the males. They all need to be unique, and include features inspired by Vanilla! Although, there will be some exceptions... since some vanilla NPCs are seriously terrifying all around.[/color][/size]

New eyes are also on this page, which have been hand painted. The major difference with these in comparison to the ones from RWoS is that the dark ring has been removed. To me it was a bit too dark for my liking. It was made for personal use however I liked them so much that I've decided to switch them out. I've included the original eyes as a miscellaneous download.

[center][color=#00ffff][size=3][b]Check out this awkward tutorial I made on sculpting faces in racemenu:[/b][/size][/color]
[youtube]HdPQiOiWfSA[/youtube]

Way less intimidating than you thought, amirite?
(apologies for the quality and... other issues. first video I've ever made)
[size=1]
[/size][color=#ead1dc][size=1]Yeah... I'm female. Not that it matters, but being called a dude is weird.[/size][/color][/center]

[color=#ffff00][size=2]I was just diagnosed with a life threatening & chronic condition that may prevent or slow down future updates (possibly stop depending how advanced it is, and how treatment goes). I apologize in advance. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to direct message me.
For now, I am going to try my best to do as much as I can... And hopefully finish... But please be patient and gentle with me in my fragile state.

I will try and keep everyone updated as time goes on.
[/size][/color]


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]What makes these textures different from RWoS?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]They look less crack whorey. After MxR said this, I decided to stop being nervous about another release and just get on with it. These are much more refined, yet more detailed in the places they needed to be. I removed the veins on the temples, softened the normal maps, and lightened around the eyes. Basically, they have been completely redone (with the exception of some smaller details). And best of all, THEY'RE NOW AVAILABLE IN UNCOMPRESSED 4K! 
You're welcome.

[size=2]
[/size][list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Why aren't the men in 4k?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]Honestly? I forgot. 4k beefcakes will be coming soon. In the meantime, they look pretty freaking good in uncompressed 2k.


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Why does this mod make my characters look like crack heads?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]Skooma.


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Will you add ... ?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]Leave a suggestion in the forums section under "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=5&&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D88002%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D6185653&pUp=1]Requests & Suggestions[/url]"


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]I'm getting seams![/size][/color][/b]
[/list]I'm aware of this. However, I've tried practically everything found online and nothing completely gets rid of them. This is constantly being worked on, and I'm hoping that eventually I will have a 100% sure fix.
If you have suggestions on how to fix this, please leave them in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=5&&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D88002%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D6185663&pUp=1]Feedback & Improvements[/url].


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]What's the point of this? Why not just use vanilla?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list][list=1]
[*]Vanilla is butt ugly.
[*]These are HD.
[*]Seriously?

[/list]
[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Will you make a version to go with (fair skin, mature skin, etc) ?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]No.


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Will you make a smoother version?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]No. [there is a 'smoother' version included, and I won't go any smoother. To me, this is as smooth as I can get without it becoming unrealistic. If you prefer something smoother, you can download whatever normal maps you want, or you can just download the head normal map and use TexBlend [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5737]CBBE[/url] or [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30759]UNP[/url] to make it fit! with my body I've had many supporters use this method and it works really well]


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]...Why not?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]Because the whole point of this is to make more natural people. Airbrushed skin is not natural.


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Physics stopped working! It's your fault![/size][/color][/b]
[/list]My mod doesn't add or edit any meshes. Another mod is at fault.


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Can I use your mod for my custom follower?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]Yes. Just credit myself and the other authors named in the permissions section and at the bottom of the description (if you just use the skin, you only need to credit those I credited FOR their skin textures).


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Can I have the racemenu preset for your character?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]There's a file in the optional section including all pictured characters, and more.


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]Why doesn't the skin look the same for me?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]I hand sculpted all my characters in racemenu, and used Citrus Hi-Poly head. If you want your character to be on the same level as mine, you can download the racemenu presets and tweak to your liking. There's quite a few, from cutesy to stern. Just make sure to use the same race (although some work fine between races). Don't forget to download Citrus[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58989] here[/url]!


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]I have suggestions to help improve upon this mod...[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]Leave your feedback in the forum section under "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=5&&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D88002%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D6185663&pUp=1]Feedback & Improvements[/url]" (you can also send me a direct message). All feedback is welcome! 


[list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]When will we get the NPC overhaul?[/size][/color][/b]
[/list]When I have something to share. 300+ NPCs are a lot to edit. I'm manually sculpting all of them in Racemenu, so it's very time consuming. If you'd like to help in creating unique NPCs, leave a post in the forums section under "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88002/?tab=5&&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D88002%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D6185703&pUp=1]Help Wanted[/url]".

[color=#ff7700][size=2]
[/size][/color][list]
[*][b][color=#ff7700][size=2]This isn't realistic! No one looks like that![/size][/color][/b]
[/list]I took pictures of [i]MYSELF[/i] and used them as stock in creating [i]ALL[/i] of my textures. [b][color=#ffd966][size=1]IT'S LITERALLY MY OWN FACE WITHOUT MAKEUP, TWEAKED TO FIT THE TEXTURES.[/size][/color]



[/b]
[b][color=#cc0000]- !!!Disclosure: RANTING ENSUED BELOW!!! -[/color][/b]
[size=1]I don't feel like explaining myself anymore. Don't like it? Don't download it. Simple as that. People like different things. You like barbie mods? Some people don't. This is a FREE mod. No one is forcing you to download anything. I spent YEARS creating these to release FOR FREE. I could just as easily charge for it somewhere else, but I choose not to. I work a full time job, a full time apprenticeship, and go to school full time. Yet I spend [/size][i]every [b]bit[/b][/i][size=1] of my free time doing this for people who actually want to use it. The hate I've received for creating these textures is exhausting.[/size]
[size=1]There's also a function to only show 'not lore-friendly' mods. I suggest you use it.[/size]

[size=2][center][b][color=#ff0000]- End Rant -[/color][/b][/center][/size]

[center][font=Georgia][size=2][i]However, the love I've received has made it all worth-while... So thank you.
Those of you who enjoy using my textures and have stuck by me make everything I do have meaning.
You encourage me to never give up doing what I love.[/i][/size][/font][/center]
[center][color=#666666]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Have actual constructive feedback? Suggestions? Requests? Want to offer help? Leave a comment in the corresponding forum topic (up top, click "Forum")

Or check out the nifty navigation bar up at the top of the page!

[/color][color=#666666]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/center][u]
[/u]


[color=#00ffff]Newest features:[/color]
NPC overhaul [size=1](in the works... recreating over 300 facegen files from scratch is a slow process)[/size]
New eyes
Racemenu overlays [size=1](skin disorders, blood, etc)[/size]
New complexions
Eyebrows
New makeup

[color=#00ffff]Moved over from RWoS:[/color]
Natural Teeth
Base complexions
Dirt replacers [size=1](moles)[/size]
Additional moles [size=1](under dirt)[/size]

[color=#9fc5e8]---------------------------------[/color]

[b][color=#00ffff]Required Mods:[/color][/b]
UNP or CBBE

[color=#00ffff]Recommended Mods:[/color]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58989]CITRUS Heads (HD Meshes)[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos[/url]

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]Bodyslide & Outfit Studio[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34331]Hi-Res Vanilla Warpaints[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733]Immersive Armors[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50459]Warmonger Armory[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51813]Common Clothes[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78593]Her Animations[/url]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71055]FNIS PCEA2 - Player Exclusive Animations (dynamic)[/url]

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/44561092]rhford2[/url] and [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/15323639]Hyareil[/url] for help with fomod [size=1](may have been for RWoS but it helped immensely)[/size]
author: Gearhog
